T02D2278:128a-0: @128a # // slob dpon klu sgrub snying po'i zhal snga nas //
T02D2278:128a-1: re ba'i dpe ni ser skya 'dra //
T02D2278:128a-2: dog pa rgyal bu gzhon nu ste //
T02D2278:128a-3: gzhan du 'dzin pa smig rgyu chu //
T02D2278:128a-4: bdag 'dzin phung byed nyi zer gzugs//
T02D2278:128a-5: snang ba gnyis ldan ne tso'i bya //
T02D2278:128a-6: dor ba thur ma 'khrul pa'i gzugs //
T02D2278:128a-7: lta bas nga rgyal chos kyi wa //
T02D2278:128a-8: sgom la der 'dzin aa nu lta //
T02D2278:128a-9: spyod pas nga rgyal 'dzin na pa //
T02D2278:128a-10: dka' bas rlom sems bzang skyong bu //
T02D2278:128a-11: dbang gi bu grol 'dod kos la //
T02D2278:128b-0: @128b rtogs pas chog zer dpal gyi bu //
T02D2278:128b-1: bla ma bla bral bla med gang+g'a mo //
T02D2278:128b-3: bde bas grub 'dod thangs bzangs glu //
T02D2278:128b-4: stong pas de bzhin gdol pa dza //
T02D2278:128b-5: de rnams bral ba'i shes pa ni //
T02D2278:128b-6: nor bu rin chen thob pa 'dra //
T02D2278:128b-7: sngon yul w'a r'a na s'ir khyim bdag pra mo ha dang //
T02D2278:128b-8: ser skya mo gru spyan mo gnyis //
T02D2278:128b-9: chu bo nee ranydza na'i 'gram ne'u sing pos ngad can du dus byas pa las /
T02D2278:128b-10: mos nyin mtshan lnga zhig tu bsdad kyang 'ongs par ma gyur to //
T02D2278:128b-11: de nas yi mug ste ma'i drung du phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:128b-13: kye bu mo mdangs rab tu zhum par gyur pa ci'i phyir zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:128b-15: kye mtshan mo gnyis dang gnyis gsum bar //
T02D2278:128b-16: khyim bdag gzhon nu la bsdad pas //
T02D2278:128b-17: yid gdungs pas ni yi chad gyur //
T02D2278:128b-18: zas dang bral ba lto ba ltogs //
T02D2278:128b-20: mas 'bras chan pa na li gang byin pas //
T02D2278:128b-21: myur du zos pas glo ba'i sul du song nas mgo 'khrugs so //
T02D2278:128b-22: de nas sman pa bshes gnyen chen po la bltas pa dang //
T02D2278:128b-23: 'di dag ni tshul ji lta bu yin zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:128b-26: gang gis gang la re ba ni //
T02D2278:128b-28: sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'phel ba ste //
T02D2278:128b-29: re ba med pas bde ba'i mchog /'di dag ni re bas phung bar 'gyur ba bstan pa ste /
T02D2278:128b-30: re ba med par bya ba'i man ngag ste dang po'o /
T02D2278:128b-32: // / sngon gyi dus na rgyal bu mgron bzangs zhes bya ba zhig la /
T02D2278:128b-33: yab thu bo'i stobs kyi rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur te /
T02D2278:128b-34: kye rgyal bu sgo srung la nan tan gyis shig
T02D2278:128b-35: khri gzhan la ma shor bar bya ba la brtson
T02D2278:128b-36: par gyis shig ces smras nas tshe'i dus byas par
T02D2278:128b-37: gyur to // de nas chos sbyin byed pa'i dus
T02D2278:128b-38: su bram ze mdun na 'gro rgyal po'i pho brang
T02D2278:128b-39: du byung ba la khri phrogs kyis dogs te langs
T02D2278:128b-40: nas sgor bya ba la phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:128b-41: nu bo 'gro bas rten pas khri phrogs so //
T02D2278:129a-0: @129a * // khyod 'o na 'bad par 'gyur ba ci'i phyir zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:129a-1: rgyal po nas babs kyis smras pa /
T02D2278:129a-2: bdag la yab kyis gdams pa bzhin //
T02D2278:129a-3: khri stan shor gyis dogs pa na //
T02D2278:129a-4: sgo yi bya ba la phyin pas //
T02D2278:129a-5: nu bos bdag gis bde ba phrogs //
T02D2278:129a-6: zhes pa dang bram zes smras pa /
T02D2278:129a-7: dogs pa dang bcas sems kyis bde mi rnyed //
T02D2278:129a-8: nyam nga dang bcas rtag tu bde mi 'gyur //
T02D2278:129a-9: gang la dogs yod de 'jig yod pa'i phyir //
T02D2278:129a-10: mkhas pa rnams kyis dogs pa spang bar bya //
T02D2278:129a-11: dog pa dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D2278:129a-14: dge slong sog ma med kyis phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:129a-15: rab tu skom gyis gdungs par gyur pa la /
T02D2278:129a-16: smig rgyu zhig chu ru 'khrul te /
T02D2278:129a-18: rab tu ngal bar gyur nas sngo'i ldum bu za zhing 'dug pa la /
T02D2278:129a-19: drang srong rkang mig gis smras pa /
T02D2278:129a-20: bgrod dka' 'khor ba'i thang chen la //
T02D2278:129a-21: gzhan du btsal 'dod mi dag ni //
T02D2278:129a-22: nyon mongs tho bas gdungs 'gyur te //
T02D2278:129a-25: de dag ni bsgom bya spang par bya ba'i man ngag ste gsum pa'o /
T02D2278:129a-27: // / sngon rgyal po brla skyes la /
T02D2278:129a-28: btsun mo lnga brgya la bu stong yod de /
T02D2278:129a-29: sras nam ga ru drang srong dpal dga' mo bslangs te //
T02D2278:129a-30: de gcig bu med pas rab tu gces par byas //
T02D2278:129a-31: rgyal bu yang bdag la ni gces pa med de /
T02D2278:129a-32: bdag la ni sdug bsngal zug rngu cung zad tsam yang byung bar phangs pas /
T02D2278:129a-33: bdag tsho'i dus byas na 'khor thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro snyam sems so //
T02D2278:129a-34: de nas nang par zhig khrus byas te /
T02D2278:129a-35: khang bzangs kyi rtse mor kha shar phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2278:129a-36: nyi zer la mig cung zad btsums nas bsdad pa dang /
T02D2278:129a-37: nyi zer gyi gya gyu la dur khrod byung bar mthong nas /
T02D2278:129a-38: bdag la dri mas gos par 'gyur snyam nas bros pa dang /
T02D2278:129a-39: khang bzangs kyi rtse mo nas ltung ste /
T02D2278:129b-0: de nas dge bsnyen blo gros bzang pos smras @129b pa ;
T02D2278:129b-1: bdag tu 'dzin pa ches pas sdug bsngal 'byung ba ste //
T02D2278:129b-2: bdag bde 'dod pas gzhan gyis gnod pa byung //
T02D2278:129b-3: bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su ngor byas nas //
T02D2278:129b-4: sems can kun kyang sman pa bzhin du bya //
T02D2278:129b-5: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste bzhi ba'o /
T02D2278:129b-7: // / sngon dze ta'i tshal du rgyal bu don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02D2278:129b-8: bdud nag po lha sbyin gnyis bya ne tso'i lus gcig las /
T02D2278:129b-9: mgo bo gnyis su gyes pa cig tu skyes par gyur to //
T02D2278:129b-10: de nas lha sbyin mgo bo gnyid log pa'i dus su /
T02D2278:129b-11: don grub kyis shing gi rtsa ba srog pa dang /
T02D2278:129b-13: dug ha la gnyis rnyed pa la /
T02D2278:129b-14: bcud ni mnyam por phan ro ni bdag rang myang ngo //
T02D2278:129b-15: zhes nas sman zos pa dang /
T02D2278:129b-16: bdud lha sbyin sman gyi sgregs pa byung ngo //
T02D2278:129b-17: de nas rab tu khros pas lha sbyin gyis dug zos pas gnyis ka phung bar gyur to //
T02D2278:129b-18: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa /
T02D2278:129b-19: de nyid mthong ba'i mkhas pa yis //
T02D2278:129b-20: sman lha'i bsod nams mi bslang zhing //
T02D2278:129b-21: dug lta mi mthun dor mi bya //
T02D2278:129b-22: blang dang dor bas phung bar 'gyur //
T02D2278:129b-23: blang dor dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste lnga pa'o /
T02D2278:129b-25: // / sngon grong khyer ser skyar bram ze nyi ma sbyin zhes bya ba la /
T02D2278:129b-26: rims nad sel bar nus pa'i /
T02D2278:129b-27: nor bu chen po mu sa ra gal ba zhes bya ba yod de /
T02D2278:129b-28: khyim bdag de la khyim thab gnyis yod pa las /
T02D2278:129b-29: gnyis ka la bu med par gyur nas /
T02D2278:129b-30: grong khyer bde ba can du khyim bdag mo sa manta zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2278:129b-31: 'dod pa'i dus btab nas phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:129b-32: sngar gyi khyim bdag mo gnyis phyi bzhin du byung bar gyur to //
T02D2278:129b-33: de nas shing sdong po rul pa cig gi khong du gab bo //
T02D2278:129b-34: de nas khyim thab gnyis phyir log pa dang /
T02D2278:129b-35: khyim thab mos manta dang sprad nas nyal po byas pa dang /
T02D2278:129b-36: khyim bdag gi mgo'i cod pan la gser gyi thur ma gnyis gyen du 'greng ba la /
T02D2278:129b-37: mig yor gyi mi gnyis su 'khrul te bram ze la smras pa /
T02D2278:130a-0: kye bzhin bzangs 'o skol ni mi gnyis @130a * //
T02D2278:130a-1: kyis nye ba nyid du non nas gda'o zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:130a-3: de ni nga'i khyim bdag mo gnyis lags te /
T02D2278:130a-4: 'o skol gyi spyod lam rgyal po la smras na /
T02D2278:130a-5: nges par chad pa gcod par gyur pas sa phyogs gzhan zhig tu bros la gshegs so zhes na //
T02D2278:130a-6: na dpe'i tshal du phyin pa dang //
T02D2278:130a-7: thur ma yin par ngo shes te sa manta rab tu 'khrul pa la 'gyod pas smras pa dang //
T02D2278:130a-8: khyim bdag mo sa mantas glu blangs pa /
T02D2278:130a-9: 'o skol mi yis skrag nas bros pa dang //
T02D2278:130a-10: 'khor ba dor bar 'dod na sgrub pa 'dis //
T02D2278:130a-11: dang po gzhi stong pa nyid nas sdug bsngal byung ste /
T02D2278:130a-12: gnyis med la gnyis su brtags pas gdungs par 'gyur //
T02D2278:130a-13: blang dor dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste drug pa'o /
T02D2278:130a-15: // / sngon mi yul ma ga dha na tshos ma
T02D2278:130a-16: ko'u ri ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyi mtha'i
T02D2278:130a-18: dur smrig gi tshos blugs pa'i bur snod cig gi nang du kha shing los bcad de /
T02D2278:130a-19: mo rang gi me tog thur phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:130a-20: dur khrod kyi wa cig gis tshos kyi steng du phyin pas sdib [?] ste /
T02D2278:130a-21: lus tshos kyi mdog gis spangs so //
T02D2278:130a-22: dur khrod du phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:130a-24: kye che zhe mchog tu gyur pa khyed su yin zhes pa la /
T02D2278:130a-25: mo na re bdag ni lha'i ri dags sha ra na zhes bya ba yin te /
T02D2278:130a-26: lus dri dang mdog tu ldan pa'o //
T02D2278:130a-27: de nas dom dang stag dang spre'u dang /
T02D2278:130a-28: seng ge rnams la sbyang kis ched du brjod pas kun kyang 'khor gyur to //
T02D2278:130a-29: de nas zla ba rgyas pa nya'i dus su ma'i drung du phyin te /
T02D2278:130a-33: ri dags kyi rje mor gyur pa'o //
T02D2278:130a-37: tshad ma'i chu las khrus byas nas //
T02D2278:130a-38: dman pa'i sa la gnas na bde ;
T02D2278:130a-39: / rgyud ngan lpags pas nga rgyal ba //
T02D2278:130a-40: yun du 'grogs na phung bar nges //
T02D2278:130a-42: gas pa'i nga rgyal gtong du ma btub pa'o //
T02D2278:130a-43: de nas log ste gcan gzan gyi tshogs su phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:130a-44: rang gis skad btang bas war gyur cing /
T02D2278:130b-0: seng ge'i skad @130b btang bas brgyal lo //
T02D2278:130b-1: de nas ri dags gcan gzan thams cad kyi spu
T02D2278:130b-2: tshom pa re btogs te rtug pa dang bsres so
T02D2278:130b-3: // de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
T02D2278:130b-4: sems kyis stobs kyis mi 'gro zhing //
T02D2278:130b-5: pags pas nga rgyal 'gro byed pa ;
T02D2278:130b-6: / rgyun du bde bar ma gyur te //
T02D2278:130b-7: spu dang bral bas wa nyid phung //
T02D2278:130b-8: bde bas 'bras bu bsgrubs pa la //
T02D2278:130b-10: grub mtha' nga rgyal 'gro byed pa //
T02D2278:130b-11: wa bzhin thal bar brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2278:130b-12: rang gi lta ba nga rgyal ba dang bral bar bya ba ste bdun pa'o /
T02D2278:130b-14: // / sngon ko sa la'i yul du /
T02D2278:130b-15: dge slong ya shu ha zhes bya ba cig gis /
T02D2278:130b-16: tshogs drug 'gegs pa'i bsam gtan byas pa las rlung
T02D2278:130b-17: 'byung 'jug 'pho ba dang bral bas lo lnga brgya
T02D2278:130b-18: rnyed thub po // de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dga' sbyangs mdangs kyis smras pa /
T02D2278:130b-19: dge slong khyod kyis sems la ltos //
T02D2278:130b-20: shes rab pha rol phyin drug ma //
T02D2278:130b-21: tsam du mi gnas 'di sgoms la //
T02D2278:130b-23: zhes pa la don la slar skur ba btab nas sngar gyi 'du shes med pa la zhen pas /
T02D2278:130b-24: lha tshe ring por skyes so //
T02D2278:130b-25: de nas mtha' 'khob rgyal por skyes so //
T02D2278:130b-26: de nas yang skye ba dran pas bstan pa la skur pa btab nas /
T02D2278:130b-27: sngar gyi 'du shes med pa la zhen pas /
T02D2278:130b-28: lha tshe ring por skyes so //
T02D2278:130b-29: de nas yang skye ba dran pas bstan pa la skur pa btab pa dang /
T02D2278:130b-30: dngos su sas thongs [*thong?] phye nas /
T02D2278:130b-31: mnar med pa'i dmyal bar song /
T02D2278:130b-32: de dag ni sgom pa dmigs pa dang bral bar bya ba ste brgyad pa'o /
T02D2278:130b-34: // / sngon bram ze 'dzin na pa zhes bya ba bsil khang na nyal ba'i rmi lam na /
T02D2278:130b-35: rigs kyi bu gtsang ma'i spyod pa long cig las byang chub mchog tu bskyed nas /
T02D2278:130b-36: shes rab dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni mchog ma yin no //
T02D2278:130b-37: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming tsam yang mi thob po //
T02D2278:130b-39: chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i phyir ro /
T02D2278:131a-0: @131a * // zhes brjod kyang mngon pa'i zhen pa dang ma bral lo //
T02D2278:131a-1: de bdud dga' rab dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2278:131a-2: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bde ba thob ste /
T02D2278:131a-3: slar ngan song du lhung ngo //
T02D2278:131a-4: spyod pa'i zhen pa dang bral bar bya ba ste dgu pa'o//
T02D2278:131a-5: sngon rgyal po bzang skyong bya ba'i bu mos /
T02D2278:131a-6: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo zhes bya ba la /
T02D2278:131a-7: lus ngag yid gsum longs spyod kyi sgo nas /
T02D2278:131a-8: lo drug tu bsnyen bkur byas so //
T02D2278:131a-9: tshogs kyi lam rtags bcu gsum dang ldan pa'i spyod pa bcu phrag gnyis su byas so //
T02D2278:131a-10: dus ji snyed du thos pa yang de snyad du sbyangs pa las /
T02D2278:131a-11: dge slong ma dpal mo zhes bya bas smras pa /
T02D2278:131a-12: kye bdag gis 'khor ba thams cad kyi snying po /
T02D2278:131a-13: mya ngan las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid khyod la sbyin gyi /
T02D2278:131a-14: khyod 'khor ba'i dogs pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:131a-16: kye dge slong ma snga ma'i dga' ba de rnams kyi 'bras bu mchog go //
T02D2278:131a-17: de las mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni mi 'byung ba'i phyir /
T02D2278:131a-18: kho mo mi 'dod do zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:131a-20: chos kyi gsung nyid mi shes par //
T02D2278:131a-21: 'bras bu 'dod pa'i dka' thub dag / rgyal po dag gi pho nya bzhin //
T02D2278:131a-22: dka' bas mang yang don chung 'gyur //
T02D2278:131a-23: dka' bas mang po byas pas chog par 'dzin par bya ba ste bcu pa'o /
T02D2278:131a-25: // / dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las /
T02D2278:131a-26: dpal mchog dang po dbang las 'byung //
T02D2278:131a-27: lus ngag yid kyi tha ba dag / dbang gis rab tu smin byas na //
T02D2278:131a-28: dpal mchog dang po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2278:131a-29: zhes bya ba la rgyal po ko sa las mthong nas /
T02D2278:131a-30: rgyal po aindra bh'u ti la /
T02D2278:131a-31: dbang ldan bcu bdun du byas so //
T02D2278:131a-32: de nas rgyal po aindra bh'u ti /
T02D2278:131a-33: kye rgyal po dam pa ni sa bon lta bu'o //
T02D2278:131a-34: rgyun du goms pa ni chu lud kyis myu gu skyed pa lta bu'o //
T02D2278:131a-35: spyod pa ni lo tog 'os su rung bar byed pa lta bu'o //
T02D2278:131a-36: des na rgyal po chen po sgom pa goms par bya ba rigs so zhes brjod kyang /
T02D2278:131b-0: @131b sngar gyi lung gis nges par kha lo sgyur du ma btub po //
T02D2278:131b-1: der mkha' 'gro mas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
T02D2278:131b-2: dbang gis ye shes mtshon byas shing //
T02D2278:131b-4: goms bral chu shing 'bras bu ltar //
T02D2278:131b-5: lan cig skyed na zad 'gyur nyid ;
T02D2278:131b-6: / zhes pa'i phyir na goms par bya'o //
T02D2278:131b-7: dbang kho nas chog par 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D2278:131b-9: // / dpal dom bi he ru ka'i slob ma shr'i sing nga zhes bya ba zhig gis /
T02D2278:131b-11: rnal 'byor pa pho mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo tshogs pa'i dus su smras pa /
T02D2278:131b-12: chos rnams stong par rtogs pa yis //
T02D2278:131b-13: de yi mtha' la sgom du med //
T02D2278:131b-14: gal te sgom na dman 'gyur te //
T02D2278:131b-15: dper na rgyal po rgyal por ni //
T02D2278:131b-16: slar yang 'dod pa med pa bzhin //
T02D2278:131b-17: buddha thams cad stong pa nyid du gcig bar rtogs nas sgom mi dgos /
T02D2278:131b-18: sgom sogs sbyin sreg thal ba 'dra //
T02D2278:131b-20: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis /
T02D2278:131b-21: kye buddha'i gsang ba yongs su 'phrogs par byed pa'i
T02D2278:131b-22: log sred can khyod nyon cig tshes gcig gi zla
T02D2278:131b-23: ba mthong bas / nya gang ba yin nam byis pa btsas thog nas stobs rdzogs pa nyid dam /
T02D2278:131b-24: sa bon btab pa nyid nas 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa nyid dam /
T02D2278:131b-25: rgya mtsho nang gi nor bu mthong bas lag tu yod pa nyid dam /
T02D2278:131b-26: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis sems can gyi don nus pa nyid dam /
T02D2278:131b-27: zas mthong ba tsam gyis bkres pa sos pa nyid dam /
T02D2278:131b-29: rtogs pa'i gtso bo la gags goms pa'i 'khor gyis mnyes par bya na /
T02D2278:131b-30: zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2278:131b-31: rtogs pas chog par 'dzin pa ni srun pa'o //
T02D2278:131b-33: bdud kyis mngon sum du byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2278:131b-34: rang nyid phung bar byas pa'o //
T02D2278:131b-35: zhes nas bsad de mkha' 'gro ma'i longs spyod du byas so //
T02D2278:131b-36: rtogs pas chog par 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o /
T02D2278:132a-1: bu mo gang+g'a mo zhes bya ba zhig gis /
T02D2278:132a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo rgyud thams cad bltas pa las /
T02D2278:132a-3: rtogs pa ji lta ba skyes te bsgoms so //
T02D2278:132a-4: de nas byang chub chen po la srin pos mchod pa'i nub mo /
T02D2278:132a-5: rnal 'byor pa thams cad tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i sar gang+g'as phyin pa dang /
T02D2278:132a-6: rnal 'byor pa thams cad mkha' 'gro mas byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2278:132a-8: ngag gis spro ba byas so //
T02D2278:132a-9: yid kyis kun du zhe sdang bar byas so //
T02D2278:132a-10: de nas gang+g'a mo'i sngar gyi rtogs pa med par gyur nas /
T02D2278:132a-11: rnal 'byor pa rnams la smras pa /
T02D2278:132a-12: kye bdag gis 'os su ma rung ba ci byas pa /
T02D2278:132a-13: khyed kyis bshad du gsol zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:132a-14: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsung mgrin gcig tu smras pa /
T02D2278:132a-15: bla ma las ni dngos grub rnyed //
T02D2278:132a-16: rig ma las ni bde ba 'byung //
T02D2278:132a-17: bla ma bral ba'i dngos grub ni //
T02D2278:132a-19: gzhan gyis dngos grub 'byung byed pa //
T02D2278:132a-20: dug dang bcas pa'i zas bzhin no //
T02D2278:132a-23: zhes bya bas dad par byas so //
T02D2278:132a-24: bla ma la ma ltos pa spang bar bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o /
T02D2278:132a-26: // / karna'i rgyal po'i bu krishna zhes bya bas /
T02D2278:132a-27: dbu ma mchog tu byas te /
T02D2278:132a-28: bka' dang bstan bcos thams cad la skur pa btab pa dang /
T02D2278:132a-29: byang phyogs kyi gnod byin gyis bzung nas /
T02D2278:132a-31: de nas yab rgyal pos sngags mkhan rnams la zhu ba byas te /
T02D2278:132a-32: bgegs bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2278:132a-33: dpal na ro pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2278:132a-34: sangs rgyas dgongs pa dpag bsam shing lta bu'i gsung dag la ;
T02D2278:132a-35: ; sems can blo'i theg pa sna tshogs byas ;
T02D2278:132a-36: / phyogs med phyogs su 'dzin pa'i bdud chen gyis //
T02D2278:132a-37: 'di dang ma 'ongs gnyis kar bslu bar 'gyur //
T02D2278:132a-38: 'gro ba'i blo la thams cad bden pa nyid //
T02D2278:132a-39: don dam yul du gang yang yod ma yin //
T02D2278:132b-0: de nyid @132b rnal 'byor sems su dbyer mi phyed //
T02D2278:132b-1: bka' la skur pa 'debs pa dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro //
T02D2278:132b-2: de'i phyir bka' mtha' dag la skur pa mi bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
T02D2278:132b-4: // / rgyal po thang bzangs glu zhes bya ba zhig / dpal kamba la la dbang blang ste /
T02D2278:132b-6: bde ba bsgom zhing 'dug pa las /
T02D2278:132b-7: dur khrod kyi yi dags thams cad kyis /
T02D2278:132b-8: bar du gcod cing sems rab tu g-yengs so //
T02D2278:132b-9: de rnal 'byor ma legs smin ka ra la zhus pa dang /
T02D2278:132b-11: las kyi phyag rgya bde ba'i gru //
T02D2278:132b-12: stong pa'i skam sa rnyed nas ci byar yod //
T02D2278:132b-13: bcos ma'i bde la bcos ma'i yid zhen na //
T02D2278:132b-14: 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal bar nus ma yin //
T02D2278:132b-16: lha lcam la rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa byas so //
T02D2278:132b-17: bde ba la zhen pa spang bar bya ba ste bco lnga ba'o /
T02D2278:132b-19: // / gdol pa dza zhes bya ba zhig gis /
T02D2278:132b-20: slob dpon chen po ku ku ri pa la brten te /
T02D2278:132b-21: don dam sems la dmigs pa'o //
T02D2278:132b-22: rdzogs pa'i rim pa phyogs gcig pa bsgoms pa las /
T02D2278:132b-23: chos thams cad brten med du zhen par 'gyur ro //
T02D2278:132b-24: de nas yul dz'a lan dha rar /
T02D2278:132b-25: rims nad kyis mi phal cher tshe'i dus byas so //
T02D2278:132b-26: lo tog thams cad ser bas bcom mo //
T02D2278:132b-27: lo lngar char ma bab nas /
T02D2278:132b-28: bram ze gsang tshig mkhan la dris pa dang /
T02D2278:132b-29: sa phyogs 'di ni mi nang pa sangs rgyas pa gnas nas /
T02D2278:132b-30: phyi rol gyi grub mtha' gsang par smra ba la phyogs te gnas pas /
T02D2278:132b-31: bkra mi shis pa sna tshogs byung ste /
T02D2278:132b-33: ma 'ongs pa la rang phung bar byed do zhes pa dang /
T02D2278:132b-34: dpal ku ku ri pas thos te ;
T02D2278:132b-35: gdol ba dza'i drung du byon nas smras pa /
T02D2278:132b-36: dang po dngos po'i chos rnams ni //
T02D2278:132b-37: stong pa nyid kyis bzlog par bya //
T02D2278:132b-38: stong pa nyid la zhen ches nas //
T02D2278:132b-39: dngos 'dzin pas kyang phung bar gyur //
T02D2278:132b-40: dug sbrul shi na dar ya kan //
T02D2278:133a-1: gyi mchog / gang la rgyas btab bde 'gyur phyir //
T02D2278:133a-2: zhes pa mthong la gnyis med sgoms //
T02D2278:133a-3: zhes nas dbang gsum pa mdzad do //
T02D2278:133a-4: de ltar slob dpon klu sgrub kyis 'das pa'i dpe bcu brjod pas /
T02D2278:133a-5: mdo rgyud dang mthun pa'i phyir ;
T02D2278:133a-6: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas su rig par bya'o //
T02D2278:133a-7: ma 'ongs pa'i dpe drug brjod pas grub pa thob pa dang mthun pa'i phyir /
T02D2278:133a-8: thams cad mkhyen par rig par bya'o //
T02D2278:133a-9: rkyen bcu drug dang bral ba'i shes pa ni /
T02D2278:133a-10: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yin pa'i phyir nor bu rin po che dang 'dra'o //
T02D2278:133a-11: slob dpon klu sgrub snying po'i zhal snga nas gsungs
T02D2278:133a-12: pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang lnga zhes bya
T02D2278:133a-14: / dpal gyi ri la mnga' bdag chen pos /
T02D2278:133a-15: rje btsun ri khrod kyis gnang ba'o //
T02D2278:133a-16: des rje btsun ka ro pa la brgyud do //
